title: LA-23-07: Acceptance of Pro Bono Legal Services Under 5 C.F.R. Part 2635, Subpart J
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/0C8E4F136C90CEC1852589D5006042C0/$FILE/LA 23-07 Acceptance of Pro Bono Legal Services Under the LEF Regulation.pdf?open
summary: The Legal Expense Fund regulation found at subpart J creates an established process for employees to accept pro bono legal services for matters arising in connection with their official position. This legal advisory provides guidance to ethics officials on how employees may accept pro bono legal services under the newly published Legal Expense Fund Regulation, 5 C.F.R. part 2635, subpart J.
